title: $:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize
author: Thomas Elmiger
name: PluginSize
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/rimi/tw5-telmiger-plugins/tree/master/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/rimi/tw5-telmiger-plugins/tree/master/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://www.tid.li/tw5/plugins.html">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://www.tid.li/tw5/plugins.html"/></$button>

!! Plugin Size

{{$:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/about}}

!!! Categories (character count)

* <<HB34>> more than 500 k
* <<HB21>> up to 500 k 
* <<HB13>> up to 100 k
* <<HB8>> up to 50 k
* <<HB5>> up to 25 k

!!! Dependencies

This is done using the following other plugins: 

* [[Editor Counter|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Ftelmiger%2FEditorCounter]] to count the characters in the text field of plugin tiddlers
* [[RPN|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Ftelmiger%2Frpn]] for number formatting
* [[Harvey Balls|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Ftelmiger%2FHarveyBalls]] for size indication icons

!!! Information

The size of installed plugins can be found on 

* a tab //{{$:/core/images/info-button}} Plugin Info// in the $:/ControlPanel 
* on $:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/plugin-info
